Rooms.Name: E.I leaving quarters
Rooms.Description: My own apartment I still can't believe I live here. Time to get going to the E.I .

Rooms.Name: Appartment Building
Rooms.Description: A worn apartment building on Liberty City's East Side. The front door leads into the lobby.

Actions.name: <<On Player Enter First Time>>
Actions.run: You stop in front of the apartment building for the first time. The entrance looks quiet, but something feels off.

PassCommands.CommandText:
ALERT ALERT ALERT!

INCOMING BREAKING NEWS FROM CHANNEL 4!
You switch your com unit to the feed. (Placeholder)

Rooms.Name: Back Alley
Rooms.Description: A very dim and narrow alley.

Rooms.Name: Bedroom
Rooms.Description: A small, sparsely furnished bedroom with a single bed, a cracked window, and faded wallpaper. The air smells faintly of dust and old linens.

Rooms.Name: Business District
Rooms.Description: You are in a luxury area with modern buildings-green, clean, and respectful-they mean business here. Here you can meet the most sophisticated crooks and sharks of this city.

Rooms.Name: Campus Library
Rooms.Description: The campus library is quiet, warm, and packed with books. Students whisper between the stacks.

Rooms.Name: City Mall
Rooms.Description: A large shopping mall with many stores and a food court.

Rooms.Name: College Security Center
Rooms.Description: Campus security headquarters. Herbert's domain.

PassCommands.CommandText: Campus security is cramped and quiet. A cheap desk, a flickering monitor, and Herbert's heavy breathing in the background.

Rooms.Name: E.I. Command Center
Rooms.Description: E.I.'s command center.

Rooms.Name: East Side
Rooms.Description: The east side of Liberty City. There are many bars and clubs on this side as well as many businesses. Not the safest place at night.... You stand in front of entrance to appartment building, nearby, in the corner a Street Vendor and a Debug Demon here.

Objects.Name: duffel bag
Objects.Description: You see a fancy duffel bag lying in the corner near the vendor machine.
Objects.Tooltip: Examine or pick up the equipment.

Actions.name: <<On Player Enter First Time>>
Actions.run: You step into the reception for the first time.

Actions.name: Examine Room
Actions.Tooltip: Examine the room for more details.
Actions.run: You look around and notice the details of the reception area.

Rooms.name: E.I. Training Room
Rooms.Description: E.I.'s training room.

PassCommands.CommandText: The room is filled with various training dummies and targets. A large screen on the wall displays a variety of training exercises.

Rooms.Name: Emily's Bedroom
Rooms.Description: A tidy bedroom with a neatly made bed and a small nightstand.

Rooms.Name: Emily's Apartment
Rooms.Description: Emily's living room. It's small but warm, with a couch, a low table, and framed photos on the wall.

Rooms.Name: Evil Elevator
Rooms.Description: Hmm... it kinda smells like piss in here...

PassCommands.CommandText: Hmm... it kinda smells like piss in here...

Rooms.Name: E.I. your personal lab(R&D)
Rooms.Description:
So this is my lab. I LOVE IT!!!!

It has everything I need to extract my revenge on Fiona! It looks like the good doctor outfitted me with a few nice gadgets. "Ohhh! A containment field, that will be good if I ever have a prisoner to hold. A giant laser well I don't know about that... I should be able to program it to keep Mini Me away at the very least ..... And my PC will have a collection of information on the Justice Force. Plus will be updated as more intel is discovered."

Debug demon:<You can also check your Email and view E.I.'s Security Feed via your PC.>
I couldn't have wished for a better lab!

PassCommands.CommandText:
"Hello! My name is Yes Man, Dr. Evils most favorite robot! I am here to ... wait you seemed to be injured" The odd robot notes.

"Yeah...I just had a..... "meeting" with Vadar. It was a little intense."

"Well, this is no good, you need to go to the hospital, right now and get fixed up!!!"

"Dr. Evil keeps a doctor on his payroll to keep all your procedures off the books. Just tell em you have a appointment with Dr. Aaron Hart, they'll see you in right away."

Go to hospital?

Rooms.Name: Vadar's Office
Rooms.Description: Dark and gloomy office of the chief of security, Vadar. He is a big fan of plants and has a large collection of them in his office.

PassCommands.CommandText: May be I will buy him some Plant???- no way!

Rooms.Name: Research Labs
Rooms.Description: 34th floor research labs.

Rooms.Name: Top Floor
Rooms.Description: A dark gold and chrome hallway that kind of gives you the willies.

PassCommands.CommandText:
DING!

The doors slides open and you feel terribly sick. Just what have you gotten yourself into here? Without looking you walk out of the elevator almost right into a pretty red head. She was wearing a lab coat and carrying two beakers full of some strange glowing liquids.

"Gwahhahhaa!!!" Yelling and dodging the young woman, she looks as if she's about to crack a smile but instead scowls at you. "BE CAREFULL! DO YOU EVEN KNOW WHAT WOULD HAVE HAPPENED IF...? " She takes a short breath..."...It doesn't matter." She sighs. "I'm sorry I...." You try to explain but it's too late the doors shut and the lass is gone. "God I just make friends wherever I go don't I...?"
A dark gold and chrome hallway that kind of gives you the willies.
A dark gold and chrome hallway that kind of gives you the willies.

Rooms.Name: Evil Incorporated Front
Rooms.Description: Hmmm...Something about this building is off

PassCommands.CommandText: [c yellow][b]Welcome to the game![/b][/c] I'm the tutorial for first time  players. If you have used Rags before please ignore this it wont be for long. The lower left corner of the game is your compass. Around the compass are little green dots indicating a direction you can travel. For right now all you can do is go inside Evil Inc's HQ. More will open up after the prolog.
You pick your Equipment. Make sure you equip everything inside before moving on!
Hmmm...Something about this building is off

Rooms.Name: Security Level
Rooms.Description: Security Level (B1).

PassCommands.CommandText: Its very dark in here, it almost sucks the life right out of you. Maybe thats the point...

Rooms.Name: Evil Reception
Rooms.Description: Evil Incorporated reception.

PassCommands.CommandText:
Upon going through the front door you notice a large but empty reception. Except for the secretary and what seems to be some sort of security officer standing next to the door.

CLICK!

"Huh...? What was that? Did the door just lock?" You mumble to your self as the door shuts behind you.Taking a careful look around you notice several security devices placed around the lobby and entrance.

<I better be careful and do what they say. I'd hate to see what they do to security risk around here....>

Debug Demon: When you enter a room and there are people in the visible characters box, right click on them to talk or look at them

Rooms.Name: Herbert's Office
Rooms.Description: Herbert work station. Gross...you just noticed his trash bin is filled with used tissue. I'm just going to assume he has a 'cold'.

PassCommands.CommandText:
Well that got me nowhere... I wonder If I could sneak in anywhere else? You crouch down and go behind the Security Building to see if there is a back door.

Hey what's this? His window is wide open. It leads directly into Herbert's Office. Well if I'm going to do this I have to go now!

Sliding the window open the rest of the way you get in with ease.

[b]CRASH! THUD![/b] On your way through the window you knock a cactus down to the ground and its pot shatters.

"Oh shit I should have tried to scan the room or something before climbing in here. I hope no one heard that...."

You quickly examine the office and see a desk and a computer on top of it.

Rooms.Name: LC Tunnel North
Rooms.Description: Northern entrance to the Liberty City tunnel.

Rooms.Name: LC Tunnel South
Rooms.Description: Southern entrance to the Liberty City tunnel.

Rooms.Name: Lecture Hall
Rooms.Description: A lecture hall with rows of seats and a large projector screen.

Rooms.Name: Liberty General Hospital
Rooms.Description: Your local hospital. It seems to have a very advanced set up here. The Justice Force must donate a lot.

Rooms.Name: Liberty University
Rooms.Description: Liberty City's very own university. The campus is beautiful but all the buildings require a security badge for entry.

Exits.LockedMessage: The library doors are locked. You need a campus security badge to enter.
The science building is locked. You need a campus security badge to enter.
The lecture hall is locked. You need a campus security badge to enter.
The gym doors are locked. You need a campus security badge to enter.

Actions.name: <<On Player Enter First Time>>
Actions.run:
"Wow this place is not too bad at all.... They must get a lot of money from the Hall of Justice. There's tons of their shit all over campus. Uggghhhhh....It's like they're brainwashing these poor kids. How sickening....."

You smile as you stroll through campus. You overhear a conversation while wandering around.

"Uhhhhh I was sooooo late for Psych 201 yesterday. I totally forgot my campus badge and I couldn't get into the fucking building!"

"Well with all these super's fighting these days you can never be too safe."

<Well that sucks! I'm going to need a Campus Security Badge to get into any of the buildings. I should check the Security Center and see if I can get one.....>

Rooms.Name: Liberty University Gym
Rooms.Description: The gym is loud and busy. Shoes squeak on the court and someone is always lifting something heavy.

Rooms.Name: Old Factory
Rooms.Description: The old Wilson Steel Mill. Been shut down for years....Maybe I should check it out...

Rooms.Name: Police Station
Rooms.Description: The local police station, busy with officers and citizens.

Rooms.Name: Road 22
Rooms.Description: 22 goes from east to west and connects those two areas of Liberty City: East Side and West Side. If you turn north you will reach well-guarded city gates. If you turn south you will reach the city Hospital, a huge Medical center named Liberty General.

Rooms.Name: Road 69
Rooms.Description: A busy city road, known for its nightlife and traffic.

Rooms.Name: Route 69
Rooms.Description: 69 connects east side with Business District of LC which situatated in NE side of the city.

Rooms.Name: Science Lab
Rooms.Description: A locked science building. The halls smell faintly of chemicals.

Rooms.Name: Tunnel North
Rooms.Description: A dark tunnel heading north.

Rooms.Name: Tunnel South
Rooms.Description: A dark tunnel heading south.

Rooms.Name: Uranus Lounge Club
Rooms.Description: Inside Uranus Lounge. Music thumps behind closed doors and the air smells like expensive perfume and cheap smoke.

Rooms.Name: Uranus Lounge
Rooms.Description: Home to Liberty City's Underworld

Rooms.Name: West Side
Rooms.Description: Liberty City West - Home of the Hall of Justice and Liberty University. In the north east direction you can see Cozy Cafe. On the north side of the district is local University campus.
